comments.content: Hand-lettering. I like as alternative: [Las Vegas](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/lasvegasfonts) Fabulous, [Kinescope](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/kinescope), [Fancier Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bluevinyl/fancier-script), [Palette](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/palette-bq)/ [Brush 455](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/brush-455) (even if I'm not a big fan of this one), [Brush Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024929/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/brush+script)
Thank you Ryuk for the information. It has been most helpful.
